skillTree.localised_description: This foetid, disgusting pus is so repulsive to the untainted that it mimics traditional armour of far greater substance.

skillTree.localised_description: The rotting foulness of the stagnant seas washes over the foes of Gutrot, decaying their very being

effects.description: Ability: "Wash in Rot"

target_if: Not on or below a platform

skillTree.localised_description: The depths of the seas house many foul things. Unleashed at Gutrot's command, they scythe through the enemy ranks

effects.description: Ability: "Entropic Vortex"

target_if: Not on or below a platform

skillTree.localised_description: Even on land, Gutrot is never far from the artillery of his battlefleet, and can summon it at a moment's notice

effects.description: Ability: "Cannons of the Fleet"

skillTree.localised_description: Gutrot implores the Urfather for his aid, bestowing his dark blessings upon nearby Champions.

effects.description: Ability: "Master of the Plaguefleets"

skillTree.localised_description: Many years of experience have taught Spume where to find the best treasure, no matter the foe

skillTree.localised_description: Copiously endowed with the blessings of Nurgle, and more than willing to share and share alike, any who come near to Gutrot are afflicted with a pulsating pox

effects.description: Ability: "Pulsating Rot"

skillTree.localised_description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

effects.description: Melee defence: +5

skillTree.localised_description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +15

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Gutrot Spume is the lord of Dragonbone tribe and commander of the greatest Plaguefleet in the north. A proud warrior whose towering arrogance often leads him into battle against overwhelming odds, Spume has risen from the ashes of former failure to reclaim his position as one of the preeminent warlords of the age.
